comment: I haven't had a professor where i've felt like I should rate them until this one lol. She is EXTREMELY strict and specific about tiny details on grading. I ended up doing well but that's because labs take a big portion of the grade. Group work is a huge chunk of it and if ur group sucks u really just have to do extra work cause she won't help

This is an Intro Biology 1107 class, but it didn't feel like an intro class. The class was stressful and difficult. She is a tough grader, she take too long to grade assignments. And sometimes the methods you are studying are not even on the exams.
rating_tags: Tough grader--Get ready to read--EXTRA CREDIT
